3.  I have huge array which is partititioned in the Variables View.  However, the partitioned nodes cannot be expanded.

In response to comment #8
point 3 is bug 123842 - it happened in our old viewers also.

I think the other points are addressed in the latest patch, however I haven't done enough testing to be sure yet.
